// # or Color - Color
// Strength - Strength (%)
// Radius - Radius (world units)
// Range - variance in animation (%)
// Duration - length of animation (milliseconds)
// Type - type (flicker, pulse, static)
// Plane - Plane level of world (int)
// Height - Height offset (world units)


Reset
